San_Leandro.Cull Canyon Regional Recreation Area:
Cull Canyon Regional Recreation Area (CCRRA) is a regional park located in Castro Valley, Alameda County, California. It is part of the East Bay Regional Park District (EBRPD)system.


== Aquatic facilities ==
CCRRA includes a fishing lake and a separate 1.5 acres (0.0061 km2) swim lagoon that resulted from damming San Lorenzo Creek.
